mapper.select: select cover_scene from table_cell_base_station, t_groupBaseInfo,t_cell_info_special where table_cell_base_station.network_name = t_groupBaseInfo.cell_code and table_cell_base_station.network_name = t_cell_info_special.cell_code GROUP BY table_cell_base_station.cover_scene limit 1000

SELECT t_groupDetailInfo.cell_code,t_groupDetailInfo.indeicator_code, t_normalcheckmetadata.indeicator_name FROM t_groupDetailInfo,t_normalcheckmetadata WHERE t_groupDetailInfo.indeicator_code = t_normalcheckmetadata.indeicator_id AND t_groupDetailInfo.cell_code = #{grouptype}
SELECT group_type FROM t_groupBaseInfo WHERE cell_code = #{cellname} LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM t_cell_health_info WHERE yyyyMMdd = (SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_health_info WHERE cell_code = #{cellname} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1) AND cell_code= #{cellname} and health_flag = 0 ORDER BY yyyyMMdd LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM t_cell_health_info WHERE STR_TO_DATE(yyyyMMdd,'%Y%m%d') > DATE_SUB((SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_health_info WHERE cell_code = #{cellname} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1),INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND cell_code=#{cellname} and health_flag = 0 ORDER BY yyyyMMdd

SELECT * FROM t_cell_health_info WHERE STR_TO_DATE(yyyyMMdd,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_SUB((SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_health_info WHERE cell_code = #{cellname} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1),INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND (SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_health_info WHERE cell_code = #{cellname} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1) AND cell_code=#{cellname} and health_flag = 0 ORDER BY yyyyMMdd
SELECT * FROM t_cell_health_info WHERE cell_code=#{cellname} and health_flag = 0 and STR_TO_DATE(yyyyMMdd,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd
SELECT cell_code FROM t_cell_health_info GROUP BY cell_code
SELECT * FROM t_cell_health_info WHERE cell_code=#{cellname} and health_flag = 0 ORDER BY yyyyMMdd limit 1

select t_cell_info.station_code from table_cell_base_station, t_groupBaseInfo,t_cell_info where table_cell_base_station.network_name = t_groupBaseInfo.cell_code and table_cell_base_station.network_name = t_cell_info.cell_code and t_cell_info.in_used = 1 GROUP BY t_cell_info.station_code
SELECT cell_code FROM t_cell_info WHERE station_code = #{stationname}

SELECT * FROM t_cell_health_info WHERE STR_TO_DATE(yyyyMMdd,'%Y%m%d') > DATE_SUB((SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_health_info WHERE cell_code = #{cellname} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1),INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND cell_code=#{cellname} and health_flag = 0 ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC limit 1
SELECT indeicator_name AS alarm_name FROM t_normalcheckmetadata WHERE indeicator_id=#{alarm_name}
SELECT app_result FROM t_cell_result_info WHERE cell_code = #{cellname} AND yyyyMMdd = #{yyyymmdd} AND app_hour = #{hour}
